title: 190: Angel Island, Obliterated! The Horror of The Raigo's Advent!!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A detailed review and analysis of Episode 190, discussing the shocking destruction of Angel Island, the atomic bomb imagery of the Raigo attack, Robin's revelation about the Golden Bell location, and the conflicted feelings about whether Luffy or Wyper should ring the bell. The reviewer notes how the anime portrayed the attack 'like an atomic bomb' and how this imagery would resonate with Japanese audiences.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the end of the Skypiea arc

title: LUFFY DEFEATS ENEL!! One Piece Episode 190, 191 & 192 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Creator
description: A combined reaction and review video covering Episodes 190-192 of One Piece, including the destruction of Angel Island, Luffy's battle with Enel, and the ringing of the Golden Bell. Features live reactions to the major moments and post-episode analysis.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers episodes 190-192, including Luffy's defeat of Enel

title: One Piece: 5 Reasons Why Skypiea Is The Most Important Arc, Explained
author: FandomWire Staff
description: An analytical article explaining why the Skypiea arc is one of the most important in One Piece, discussing its themes of truth prevailing over lies, the symbolism of the Golden Bell, foreshadowing of future story elements, and the arc's underrated status among fans.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis that references events throughout the entire series, including late-game revelations

title: 10 Best Episodes from One Piece's Sky Island Arc, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: A ranked list of the best episodes from the Skypiea/Sky Island arc, with analysis of what makes each episode memorable. Episode 190 would likely be featured prominently due to the dramatic destruction of Angel Island and the Raigo's debut.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea arc

title: [ONE PIECE] Skypiea - The Most Important Arc in the History of One Piece
author: ResetEra Community
description: An extensive forum discussion thread analyzing the Skypiea arc episode-by-episode and chapter-by-chapter. Includes detailed discussion of Episode 190's significance, the Raigo attack, and how the arc sets up future plot developments. Community members debate the arc's themes and importance to the overall story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discussion contains spoilers for the entire series including recent chapters

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive recap and review of the Skypiea arc, rating it 7/10. Discusses the arc's controversial reception, with some fans finding it skippable while others defend it as crucial development. Covers the major plot points including the destruction of Angel Island.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for the entire Skypiea arc

title: Revisiting Skypiea: Essential Episodes and Underrated Gems in One Piece's Sky Island Arc
author: ChibiBytes
description: An article arguing for a reevaluation of the Skypiea arc, describing it as 'misunderstood and often undervalued' while noting it 'laid down pivotal foundations for future arcs.' Highlights essential episodes including the climactic destruction scenes.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains references to how Skypiea connects to later arcs

title: Angel Island Obliterated! The Horror of the Raigo's Advent
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 190 on Crunchyroll, featuring the complete episode with English subtitles. Available in the Sky Island arc collection (episodes 136-206).
